title: End of game bug
body: After every single game without fail I get a bug splat, the game crashes after a victory screen or defeat screen. Not sure if the game crashing is causing the bug splat or the bug splat at the end is making it crash.  Anyone else had similar problems? any suggestions to fix it?

replies.body: How does your computer usually handle programs that dock into the taskbar?
I am also getting this problem please help :)
